verses.verse: <S%H8085>"Hear<s%> <S%H1004>this,<s%> house of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> you who are <S%H7121>called<s%> by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and have come <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4325>waters<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> who <S%H7650>swear<s%> by the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and make <S%H2142>mention<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> but not in <S%H571>truth,<s%> nor in <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>

(for they <S%H7121>call<s%> themselves of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and <S%H5564>stay<s%> themselves on the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> is his <S%H8034>name<s%>):

I have <S%H5046>declared<s%> the former <S%H7223>things<s%> from of <S%H227>old;<s%> <S%H3318>yes,<s%> they went forth out of my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and I <S%H8085>showed<s%> <S%H6597>them:<s%> suddenly I <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H935>them,<s%> and they happened.
Because I <S%H1847>knew<s%> that you are <S%H7186>obstinate,<s%> and your <S%H6203>neck<s%> is an <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H1517>sinew,<s%> and your <S%H4696>brow<s%> <S%H5154>brass;<s%>

therefore I have <S%H5046>declared<s%> it to you from of <S%H227>old;<s%> before it came to <S%H935>pass<s%> I <S%H8085>showed<s%> it to <S%H559>you;<s%> lest you should say, <S%H6090><s%> 'My idol has <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H6459>them,<s%> and my engraved image, and my molten <S%H5262>image,<s%> has commanded <S%H6680>them.<s%>'

You have <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H2372>it;<s%> see all <S%H5046>this;<s%> and you, will you not declare <S%H8085>it?<s%> "I have shown you new <S%H5341>things<s%> from this <S%H6258>time,<s%> even hidden <S%H5341>things,<s%> which you have not <S%H3045>known.<s%>

They are <S%H1254>created<s%> <S%H6440>now,<s%> and not from of old; and before this <S%H3117>day<s%> you <S%H8085>didn't<s%> hear <S%H559>them;<s%> lest you should say, <S%H3045><s%> 'Behold, I knew them.'

<S%H8085>Yes,<s%> you didn't hear; <S%H3045>yes,<s%> you didn't know; <S%H241>yes,<s%> from of old your ear was not <S%H6605>opened:<s%> for I <S%H3045>knew<s%> that you dealt <S%H898>very<s%> <S%H898>treacherously,<s%> and was <S%H7121>called<s%> a <S%H6586>transgressor<s%> from the <S%H990>womb.<s%>
For my <S%H8034>name<s%>'s sake will I <S%H748>defer<s%> my <S%H639>anger,<s%> and for my <S%H8416>praise<s%> will I <S%H2413>refrain<s%> for <S%H3772>you,<s%> that I not cut you off.
<S%H6884>Behold,<s%> I have refined <S%H3701>you,<s%> but not as silver; I have <S%H977>chosen<s%> you in the <S%H3564>furnace<s%> of <S%H6040>affliction.<s%>
For my own <S%H6213>sake,<s%> for my own sake, will I do <S%H2490>it;<s%> for how should my name be profaned? I will not <S%H5414>give<s%> my <S%H3519>glory<s%> to <S%H312>another.<s%>
<S%H8085>"Listen<s%> to <S%H3290>me,<s%> O Jacob, and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> my <S%H7121>called:<s%> I am <S%H7223>he;<s%> I am the first, I also am the <S%H314>last.<s%>

<S%H3027>Yes,<s%> my hand has laid the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> and my right <S%H3225>hand<s%> has <S%H2946>spread<s%> out the <S%H8064>heavens:<s%> when I <S%H7121>call<s%> to <S%H5975>them,<s%> they stand up <S%H3162>together.<s%>

<S%H6908>"Assemble<s%> <S%H8085>yourselves,<s%> all you, and hear; who among them has <S%H5046>declared<s%> these <S%H3068>things?<s%> He whom Yahweh <S%H157>loves<s%> shall <S%H6213>perform<s%> his <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> on <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> and his <S%H2220>arm<s%> shall be on the <S%H3778>Chaldeans.<s%>
<S%H1696>I,<s%> even I, have spoken; <S%H7121>yes,<s%> I have called <S%H935>him;<s%> I have brought <S%H1870>him,<s%> and he shall make his way <S%H6743>prosperous.<s%>

<S%H7126>"Come<s%> <S%H7126>near<s%> to me and <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H7218>this:<s%> "From the beginning I have not <S%H1696>spoken<s%> in <S%H5643>secret;<s%> from the <S%H6256>time<s%> that it <S%H136>was,<s%> there am I." Now the Lord <S%H3069>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H7307>me,<s%> with his Spirit.

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> your <S%H1350>Redeemer,<s%> the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> who <S%H3925>teaches<s%> you to <S%H3276>profit,<s%> who <S%H1869>leads<s%> you by the <S%H1870>way<s%> that you should <S%H3212>go.<s%>

Oh <S%H3863>that<s%> you had <S%H7181>listened<s%> to my <S%H4687>commandments!<s%> then your <S%H7965>peace<s%> would have been like a <S%H5104>river,<s%> and your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> like the <S%H1530>waves<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea:<s%>

your <S%H2233>seed<s%> also had been as the <S%H2344>sand,<s%> and the <S%H6631>offspring<s%> of your <S%H4578>body<s%> like its <S%H4579>grains:<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> would not be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> nor <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> from before <S%H6440>me.<s%>

Go <S%H3318>forth<s%> from <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> <S%H1272>flee<s%> from the <S%H3778>Chaldeans;<s%> with a <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7440>singing<s%> <S%H5046>declare,<s%> <S%H8085>tell<s%> <S%H3318>this,<s%> utter it even to the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth:<s%> <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1350>redeemed<s%> his <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%>

They <S%H6770>didn't<s%> thirst when he <S%H3212>led<s%> them through the <S%H2723>deserts;<s%> he caused the <S%H4325>waters<s%> to <S%H5140>flow<s%> out of the <S%H6697>rock<s%> for <S%H1234>them;<s%> he split the <S%H6697>rock<s%> <S%H4325>also,<s%> and the waters gushed <S%H2100>out.<s%>
"There is no <S%H7965>peace,<s%>" <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> "for the <S%H7563>wicked.<s%>"
